entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Update entity using isModified = false do update the DB sometime #31295
  • [Q]: Why? `InvalidCastException: Unable to cast object of type 'System.Int32' to type 'System.String'.` #31293
  • Add SQLite table rebuild code to migrations #31291

Closed

  • EFCore pulls latest packages from dotnet/runtime but LKG shared framework from the SDK #31300
    8.0.0-preview7
  • How to do a missing migration check in CI #26348
    8.0.0-preview7
  • Do we have EntityConverter that like ValueConverter? #31292
  • Code Analysis should also check for EF client side evaluation #31288

PullRequests

Created

  • Query: Translate DEGREES and RADIANS #31301
  • Bump Grpc.AspNetCore from 2.45.0 to 2.55.0 #31296
    blocked, area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:

Merged

  • Bring in LinqToCSharpTranslator #31294
  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.Identity.EntityFrameworkCore from 7.0.7 to 7.0.9 #31297
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • Bump Microsoft.Azure.Cosmos from 3.35.1 to 3.35.2 #31298
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
  • [TINY] Use .NET 8.0 UnreachableException where appropriate #31299
  • API Review changes for complex types #31290
  • Target .NET 8 #31270
    auto-merge
  • Add `migrations has-pending-model-changes` Command #31164
    community-contribution
  • Fixes and cleanup around JSON collection SQL value conversions #31261
  • Added using existing collection for primitive collections not inside a JSON doc #31285
  • Uses existing JSON primitive collection instead of creating a new one #31282

Updated

  • Update SDK to 8.0.100-preview.7.23364.32 #31284
    blocked, area-infrastructure
  • Support querying over non-primitive JSON collections #31095
  • Part of JSON primitive collection serialization #31272
  • Fix to #30922 - Most cases of projecting a primitive collection don't work #31263
  • [release/7.0] Bump Microsoft.Data.SqlClient to 5.1.1 #31286
    Servicing-approved, 7.0.x
  • [release/7.x] Perform alias uniquification in ExecuteUpdate setters #31208
    Servicing-approved, 7.0.x
  • [release/7.0] Fix to #29572 - Json: predicate on json bool property generates incorrect sql #31264
    Servicing-approved, 7.0.x
  • Add DateOnly.ToString / TimeOnly.ToString query mapping for SQL Server #31289
